author: Bryan Layton
text:
The City of San Antonio is looking to establish an Administrative Hearing process for Code Enforcement violations instead of sending all cases to municipal courts.  If your organization uses an administrative hearing process, please copy and paste the link below into your browser to answer a few short survey questions.  Thank you for sharing! 
http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/AdministrativeHearingSurvey
title: Administrative Hearings
